amendment.description: To provide for a report by the Comptroller General on certain contracts performed in, or relating to, Iraq, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1855 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1855 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S12660; text: CR S12660) To provide for a report by the Comptroller General on certain contracts performed in, or relating to, Iraq, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1855 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1855 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Harkin.
